content: middle in this case the ch4 is to prefer so that you do not ruin the middle of the flower this is a free pattern you are however not allowed to sell or claim as your own nor to sell the finished product as your own or claim any copyright over the pattern feel free to share pictures of your finished piece and you progress on social media please credit the pattern to me by using my hashtags #crochetingkay #fab5flower #thefab5flower the fab 5 flower round 1 a ch4 slip_stitch to make ring *popcorn ch2 this is not including the closing chain for the popcorn repeat from * in total of five times fo and make invisible join - 5 popcorns 5 ch2-space round 2 b work only in the ch2-space for this round start in any ch2-space *slip_stitch ch1 5dc ch1 slip_stitch repeat from * making 5 petals fo and make invisible join - 25dc 10 slip_stitch 10 ch1 5 petals round 3 c ***for this and the next round you will be using the same colour if you do not want to fo after this round you need to follow the instructions from the wall hanging bonus pattern from crochetedbytess for rnds 3 and 4 so that you start in the correct place to be able to continue smoothly for the next round*** in this round you only crochet around the popcorns and in the dcs from previous round ie skipping the sl sts and chs made in round 2 standing *fpdc around the popcorn from round 1 ch1 bpsc in the next 5 double_crochet ch1 repeat from * til end fo and make invisible join 25bpsc 10 ch1 5fpdc round 4 c in this round you crochet only in the bpsc and therefore skipping the ch1 fpdc ch1 in the 5 bpsc of each petal *single_crochet half_double_crochet 3dc ch1 3dc half_double_crochet single_crochet repeat from * till end fo of and make invisible join 30dc 10hdc 10sc 5 ch1 round 5 a in this round you will skip all of the single_crochet made in the previous round do the following for each petal *slip_stitch single_crochet 2hdc 2hdc half_double_crochet picot3 half_double_crochet in the ch1-space 2hdc 2hdc single_crochet slip_stitch ch1 fpdc in popcorn ** in between your petals you will do the following ch1 fpdc around the 3rd double_crochet of the popcorn made in round 1 ch1 repeat from * for all five petals fo and make invisible join 50hdc 5picot3 10sc 10sl st 10 ch1 5fpdc ** locate the middle double_crochet i e the 3rd double_crochet in your popcorn and make the fpdc around that see notes for detailed pictures finished the fab 5 flower us shorthand round 1 a ch4 slip_stitch to make ring popcorn ch2 x5 -
